data.enText: a large official meeting, usually lasting for a few days, at which people with the same work or interests come together to discuss their views
data.chText: （通常持续几天的大型正式）会议，研讨会

data.enText: The hotel is used for exhibitions, conferences and social events.
data.chText: 这家饭店用于举行展览、大型会议和社交活动。
会议室 / 中心 / 厅

data.enText: She is attending a three-day conference on AIDS education.
data.chText: 她正在出席一个为期三天的有关艾滋病教育的会议。

data.enText: The conference will be held in Glasgow.
data.chText: 会议将在格拉斯哥举行。

data.enText: delegates to the Labour Party's annual conference
a meeting at which people have formal discussions
Ministers from all four countries involved will meet at the conference table this week.
data.chText: 有关四国将各派部长于本周开会协商。

data.enText: He was in conference with his lawyers all day.
data.chText: 他与他的律师们商讨了一整天。

data.enText: a group of sports teams that play against each other in a league

data.chText: 东南部联盟的橄榄球联赛

means: (通常持续几天的大型正式)研讨会

ex.enText: The meeting will be held next week.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，指人们集合在一起讨论或决定某事的集会，可用于任何场合。

ex.enText: The International Peace Conference will be held in Geneva.
ex.chText: 世界和平大会将在日内瓦举行。

ex.enText: More than 100 representatives attended the UN conference on the environment. 100
ex.chText: 多名代表出席了联合国环境大会。

synonyms.bx: 尤指会持续数天的、有关政治、商业等重要事务的大型正式会议。

ex.enText: This year's teacher's convention is around the corner.
ex.chText: 今年的教师大会即将召开。

ex.enText: Where are they holding their party convention?
ex.chText: 他们在哪里召开党员大会？

synonyms.bx: 指同一职业、同一组织或有共同爱好的人聚在一起召开的大型正式会议。

ex.enText: When will the televised session of parliament start?
ex.chText: 电视直播的议会会议什么时候开始？

ex.enText: Why did the board members meet in closed session?
ex.chText: 委员会成员为什么举行闭门会议？

synonyms.bx: 指正式会议，尤指议会的一次会议或系列会议。

tr: a discussion among participants who have an agreed (serious) topic
an association of sports teams that organizes matches for its members
a prearranged meeting for consultation or exchange of information or discussion (especially one with a formal agenda)

example.ex: The President summoned all the state governors to a conference on education.
example.tran: 总统召集各州州长召开了一次教育研讨会。

example.ex: Last weekend the Roman Catholic Church in Scotland held a conference, attended by 450 delegates.
example.tran: 上周末，苏格兰的天主教会举行了一次会议，450名代表与会。

value.def: A conference is a meeting, often lasting a few days, which is organized on a particular subject or to bring together people who have a common interest.
value.tran: (常持续数天的)专题讨论会，研讨会

example.ex: They sat down at the dinner table, as they always did, before the meal, for a conference...
example.tran: 他们在餐桌旁坐下，和平常一样，吃饭之前要开个会。

example.ex: Her employer was in conference with two lawyers and did not want to be interrupted.
example.tran: 她的老板在和两位律师谈事情，不想有人打扰。

value.def: A conference is a meeting at which formal discussions take place.

trans: 记者招待会；新闻发布会
